input_text:
Job Title: Landscape Architect

Location: Skokie, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
Greenwise Organic Lawn Care is seeking a part-time (20-25 hours / week) Marketing Manager to lead the creation and distribution of the company's marketing content, including:
Instagram content, 3-4x posts weekly, including both photos and reels (content capture, editing, posting)LinkedIn thought leadership content, 1x weeklyWeekly email communication to clients via MailChimpWeekly blog content and Google My Business posts
In this role, the Marketing Manager would both capture and create content and post that content on relevant social media platforms. Greenwise will provide direction on content and can assist in providing photos and videos and has third-party photography/videography resources to leverage as well.
This professional should be local to the Chicago market.
Responsibilities:Create email weekly marketing content for client communication and distribute through MailChimpGenerate weekly blog content for website and post content updates to Google My BusinessCreate content (photography, written content) through on-site visits with crews and collaboration with sales staff (done with both iPhone and professional equipment, which will be provided)Leverage third-party photographer/videographer for additional contentEffectively use Instagram Reels and other video tools to display Greenwise's landscaping workUnderstand client interests and seasonal trends to create content that's relevant for time of year and Greenwise's client demographicDevelop and implement social media strategies to increase brand awareness, engagement and number of followersMonitor and report on performance metrics, analytics and campaign effectiveness
Experience:Proven work experience as a Marketing and/or Social Media Manager or similar roleKnowledge of content creation, proofreading, and video editingStrong understanding and experience with social media marketing tools, including Instagram, Facebook and LinkedInBasic photography skills for capturing visual content (videos and photos)Proficient in graphic design software for creating visually appealing content (Adobe Premiere, Canva, CapCut, etc.)Familiarity with lawn care or related service industries is a plus, but not requiredDegree in Marketing, Communications or a related field is preferred, but not required
If you are passionate about leading marketing content strategy and execution for a fast-growing, sustainability-forward service company, we want to hear from you!
Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter outlining your relevant experience.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Landscape Architect
job_responsibilities: Create weekly marketing content for client communication using MailChimp
Generate weekly blog content for the website and update Google My Business
Capture and create content through on-site visits with crews and collaboration with sales staff using iPhone and professional equipment
Leverage third-party photographer/videographer for additional content
Use Instagram Reels and other video tools to display landscaping work
Develop and implement social media strategies to increase brand awareness, engagement, and number of followers
Monitor and report on performance metrics, analytics, and campaign effectiveness
